Join Us

Conscious creators of heaven on earth

This is the place we heal, create and connect with our soul tribe.

If you are giving birth to your dream project or business to create your heaven on Earth, this is the place for you to connect with conscious leaders, entrepreneurs, artists who speak your heart's language.

This is your soul tribe if:

  • You are done with the old world, the status quo and unsustainable systems and you want change,
  • You give great value to personal growth, emotional awareness, deep authentic connections,
  • You feel alone in your progress, sometimes it feels like it is impossible to find the people who share the same values with you,
  • You have the courage to create the life that you have dreamed of but you don't know where to start or how to take the next step.

Does it resonate?

Join Us

We are Elif and Phil, founders of Co-Alignment.

We dream of a world that is designed for the people, with unconditional love and compassion for all beings. A world that we connect deeply to ourselves, to each other and to nature. A world that every one of us live humanly, expressing their creative genius, free from modern slavery. We dream to create heaven on Earth, and we need more dreamers like you.

We created Halo, to give birth to our dream community of changemakers.

In Halo we heal from inside out, connect to the creative genius we are and let the Universe create through us.

We go through our unique journeys hand to hand, share our challenges with each other, grow and transform inside out to bring our dreams to reality.

Our tools are immersive group meditations, masterhearts where we connect authentically, and learning tools that are tailored to our community's needs; like workshops, expert talks and group coaching sessions.

In your HALO journey you will learn:

  • How to heal the limited beliefs and past traumas that hold you back from reaching your full potential,
  • How to stay in awe and childlike astonishment to tap into your creative genius,
  • How to connect with your mind-body in a loving, caring, holistic way,
  • How to manifest and attract possibilities and opportunities to your life in an effortless way.

Does it resonate?

Join Us

We can see your halo 💖 Join us for creating heaven on Earth together.
